TextLibrary.Text: My training is complete. I have decided to join the Theiran Knights.
My training is complete. I have decided to join the Theiran Knights.
My training is complete. I have decided to join the Theiran Knights.
My training is complete. I have decided to join the Theiran Knights.
Good choice, and none too soon. Evil is stirring in the north, and we will soon be called upon to stand against it.
